title: Dark Fire
description: With the Earth on the brink of recolonisation by dragons, David Rain is sent on an important to seek out and destroy a trace of dark fire, the deadliest force in the universe. But with success could come a terrible price, the sacrifice of a beloved clay dragon. How much does the life of one small dragon count, when the alternative is the birth of a darkling...?
author: Chris d'Lacey
